name: XCOM 2 - Anarchy's Children
description: XCOM 2 This rebellion-themed content pack introduces more than 100 new exotic customizations for the entire arsenal of armors available to your XCOM soldiers. These options are purely cosmetic and do not alter the stats of a soldier.This content is part of the XCOM2 Reinforcement Pack and the XCOM2 Digital Deluxe Edition. If you already purchased the XCOM2 Reinforcement Pack or the XCOM2 Digital Deluxe Edition, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again.
